name: King's Field: Pilot Style
description: King's Field III (キングスフィールドIII) is a medieval-themed first-person role-playing video game developed by FromSoftware for the PlayStation in 1996. It is the third entry in the King's Field series and the last one for the original PlayStation. The English language version was renumbered and retitled King's Field II, because the original King's Field was released only in Japan.
